body_html:
Another workaround:

import torch.nn.functional as F

print((b[..., 0] - F.log_softmax(b, -1)[..., 0]).shape)  #  should be (2, 3) and is (2, 3)

I'll probably stick to one of these workarounds; thanks!
body_text:
Another workaround:
import torch.nn.functional as F

print((b[..., 0] - F.log_softmax(b, -1)[..., 0]).shape)  #  should be (2, 3) and is (2, 3)

I'll probably stick to one of these workarounds;  thanks!
body:
Another workaround:

```
import torch.nn.functional as F

print((b[..., 0] - F.log_softmax(b, -1)[..., 0]).shape)  #  should be (2, 3) and is (2, 3)
```

I'll probably stick to one of these workarounds;  thanks!
